PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
Bateesa Saul Tobius is a Software Engineer and Data Scientist with a passion for leveraging
cutting-edge technologies to drive impactful solutions. Tobius possesses a strong foundation in
deep learning, machine learning, and data science. With expertise in business intelligence, data
analytics, and data visualization techniques, Tobius excels in extracting actionable insights from
complex datasets.
Demonstrating a keen ability to develop and deploy machine learning models, Tobius is proficient
in API integration and adept at creating robust and scalable software solutions.
Proficient in a wide range of programming languages, including Python, R, Java, C, C++, PHP,
JavaScript (including Jquery, React.js, and React Native), SQL, and HTML/CSS.
Tobius thrives in dynamic environments, displaying strong problem-solving skills and adaptability.
With a collaborative and results-oriented approach, Tobius is a valuable team player who excels in
cross-functional collaborations. In addition to technical expertise, Tobius is well-versed in DevOps
and MLOps methodologies, leveraging best practices for efficient software development and data
science workflows.
As a passionate tech enthusiast, Tobius actively engages in knowledge sharing initiatives. Tobius
has a strong commitment to empowering others through presentations, blogs, academic papers,
one-on-one discussions, and seminars. Tobius is an active member of Data Science Africa (DSA),
a community that empowers aspiring and established data scientists across Africa. Tobius also
contributes as a member of the AI Mentorship Program, fostering the growth and orientation of

upcoming data scientists at Makerere Artificial Intelligence and Data Science Lab, Makerere
University.

PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
Bateesa Saul Tobius is a Software Engineer and Data Scientist with a passion for leveraging
cutting-edge technologies to drive impactful solutions. Tobius possesses a strong foundation in
deep learning, machine learning, and data science. With expertise in business intelligence, data
analytics, and data visualization techniques, Tobius excels in extracting actionable insights from
complex datasets.
Demonstrating a keen ability to develop and deploy machine learning models, Tobius is proficient
in API integration and adept at creating robust and scalable software solutions.
Proficient in a wide range of programming languages, including Python, R, Java, C, C++, PHP,
JavaScript (including Jquery, React.js, and React Native), SQL, and HTML/CSS.
Tobius thrives in dynamic environments, displaying strong problem-solving skills and adaptability.
With a collaborative and results-oriented approach, Tobius is a valuable team player who excels in
cross-functional collaborations. In addition to technical expertise, Tobius is well-versed in DevOps
and MLOps methodologies, leveraging best practices for efficient software development and data
science workflows.
As a passionate tech enthusiast, Tobius actively engages in knowledge sharing initiatives. Tobius
has a strong commitment to empowering others through presentations, blogs, academic papers,
one-on-one discussions, and seminars. Tobius is an active member of Data Science Africa (DSA),
a community that empowers aspiring and established data scientists across Africa. Tobius also
contributes as a member of the AI Mentorship Program, fostering the growth and orientation of

upcoming data scientists at Makerere Artificial Intelligence and Data Science Lab, Makerere
University.

• Experience in development cooperation and agile facilitation methodologies is a plus.

PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
Bateesa Saul Tobius is a Software Engineer and Data Scientist with a passion for leveraging
cutting-edge technologies to drive impactful solutions. Tobius possesses a strong foundation in
deep learning, machine learning, and data science. With expertise in business intelligence, data
analytics, and data visualization techniques, Tobius excels in extracting actionable insights from
complex datasets.
Demonstrating a keen ability to develop and deploy machine learning models, Tobius is proficient
in API integration and adept at creating robust and scalable software solutions.
Proficient in a wide range of programming languages, including Python, R, Java, C, C++, PHP,
JavaScript (including Jquery, React.js, and React Native), SQL, and HTML/CSS.
Tobius thrives in dynamic environments, displaying strong problem-solving skills and adaptability.
With a collaborative and results-oriented approach, Tobius is a valuable team player who excels in
cross-functional collaborations. In addition to technical expertise, Tobius is well-versed in DevOps
and MLOps methodologies, leveraging best practices for efficient software development and data
science workflows.
As a passionate tech enthusiast, Tobius actively engages in knowledge sharing initiatives. Tobius
has a strong commitment to empowering others through presentations, blogs, academic papers,
one-on-one discussions, and seminars. Tobius is an active member of Data Science Africa (DSA),
a community that empowers aspiring and established data scientists across Africa. Tobius also
contributes as a member of the AI Mentorship Program, fostering the growth and orientation of

upcoming data scientists at Makerere Artificial Intelligence and Data Science Lab, Makerere
University.

PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
Bateesa Saul Tobius is a Software Engineer and Data Scientist with a passion for leveraging
cutting-edge technologies to drive impactful solutions. Tobius possesses a strong foundation in
deep learning, machine learning, and data science. With expertise in business intelligence, data
analytics, and data visualization techniques, Tobius excels in extracting actionable insights from
complex datasets.
Demonstrating a keen ability to develop and deploy machine learning models, Tobius is proficient
in API integration and adept at creating robust and scalable software solutions.
Proficient in a wide range of programming languages, including Python, R, Java, C, C++, PHP,
JavaScript (including Jquery, React.js, and React Native), SQL, and HTML/CSS.
Tobius thrives in dynamic environments, displaying strong problem-solving skills and adaptability.
With a collaborative and results-oriented approach, Tobius is a valuable team player who excels in
cross-functional collaborations. In addition to technical expertise, Tobius is well-versed in DevOps
and MLOps methodologies, leveraging best practices for efficient software development and data
science workflows.
As a passionate tech enthusiast, Tobius actively engages in knowledge sharing initiatives. Tobius
has a strong commitment to empowering others through presentations, blogs, academic papers,
one-on-one discussions, and seminars. Tobius is an active member of Data Science Africa (DSA),
a community that empowers aspiring and established data scientists across Africa. Tobius also
contributes as a member of the AI Mentorship Program, fostering the growth and orientation of

upcoming data scientists at Makerere Artificial Intelligence and Data Science Lab, Makerere
University.
